nio/AmazonSES.description: Block for sending email via Amazon Simple Email Service.  Html message bodies are supported.

bcc_recipients.title: BCC Recipient Emails
bcc_recipients.description: A list of bcc recipient email addresses. These addresses can be expressions. The expressions can also evaluate to lists for your convenience.

cc_recipients.title: CC Recipient Emails
cc_recipients.description: A list of cc recipient email addresses. These addresses can be expressions. The expressions can also evaluate to lists for your convenience.

creds.title: AWS Credentials
creds.description: An object containing your IAM identity (access_key: string, access_secret: string)

message.title: Message
message.description: An object defining the contents of the emails (subject: expression, body: expression)

sender.title: Sender Email
sender.description: Sender email address. Must be verified with SES. See below for detail.

to_recipients.title: To Recipient Emails
to_recipients.description: A list of recipient email addresses. These addresses can be expressions. The expressions can also evaluate to lists for your convenience.

default.description: Any list of signals.  Messages are constructed by evaluating message.subject and message.body against each signal.

quota.description: Returns send-quota information for your SES account.

stats.description: Returns send, bounce, and complaint statistics for your SES account.
